metadata.description: Marketplace for Agent skills curated for the MCPBundler app(https://mcpbundler.com)

plugins.name: swiftui-liquid-glass
plugins.description: Implement, review, or improve SwiftUI features using the iOS 26+ Liquid Glass API. Use when asked to adopt Liquid Glass in new SwiftUI UI, refactor an existing feature to Liquid Glass, or review Liquid Glass usage for correctness, performance, and design alignment.

plugins.name: brainstorming
plugins.description: You MUST use this before any creative work - creating features, building components, adding functionality, or modifying behavior. Explores user intent, requirements and design before implementation.

plugins.name: swiftui-ui-patterns
plugins.description: Best practices and example-driven guidance for building SwiftUI views and components. Use when creating or refactoring SwiftUI UI, designing tab architecture with TabView, composing screens, or needing component-specific patterns and examples.
